misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is a golfer known for his relaxed demeanor and unwavering spirit. Representing St. Laurence Golf, Martin is rarely seen on the course without a drink in hand, embodying a true passion for the social side of the sport.

With nine past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Martin's experience is undeniable. He has claimed the coveted Hector Trophée title once, demonstrating his ability to perform under pressure in the pairs format. Furthermore, Martin distinguished himself as an exceptional individual player when he captured the Victor Trophy.
Hector Trophée 2025 will mark Martin's tenth appearance in the tournament. His fellow competitors know that his laid-back attitude belies a fierce competitive drive.
